programme.title: America’s Mayor Live
programme.desc: Former NY Mayor Rudy Giuliani gives insight on leadership, courage, and the most pressing issues of our time.

programme.desc: Veteran broadcaster Wendy Bell takes a deep dive into tough issues with guests from across the country.

programme.desc: Greg Kelly gives hardest-hitting reports and analysis from L.A. to N.Y., from Beltway to Rust Belt, talking with you and for you!

programme.title: Ed Henry The Briefing
programme.desc: Catch the latest headline and in-depth analysis on The Briefing, your go-to news show for a comprehensive afternoon update, with a dynamic blend of breaking news, politics, and business.

programme.desc: Rick Leventhal delivers comprehensive analysis and exclusive interviews on current affairs and significant events from home and abroad.

programme.title: David Harris Jr. The Pulse
programme.desc: David Harris Jr. delivers hard hitting analysis and opinion of latest news and events.

programme.title: Socialism in America
programme.desc: Experts and former citizens of communist and socialist countries warn of the alarming rise of socialism in America by sharing historical similarities and personal experiences.

programme.title: The '80s: Decade of Decision
programme.desc: In the 1980s Wall Street boomed! Greed was good, and so were big hair, Rubik's Cube, personal computers, Madonna, flying DeLoreans, and so much more! Take a step back in time to relive this era of self-indulgence.

programme.title: The '90s: Decade of Change
programme.desc: With baby boomers coming of age -- the 1990s ushered in a new era of peace and prosperity in America.

programme.title: To the Shores of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: Dramatic account of the American invasion of Iwo Jima. Depicts ship bombardment, rocket fire, air bombing, use of flamethrowers, and individual and group combat.

programme.title: Vision: Elon Musk’s Story
programme.desc: Elon Musk, the serial innovator, entrepreneur and free speech warrior is transforming life as we know it with advances in technology, outer space, politics, and government policy.

programme.title: CENSORED! Losing Our First Freedoms
programme.desc: Big Tech, the left and anti-American global forces are working to crush open discussion, honest debate and truth in America.

programme.title: First Edition
programme.desc: Start your day with a thorough overview of the latest news, insightful commentary, and expert analysis.
